top_comments.comment: Why isn't Bannon indicted yet? Are you people too afraid, just don't care or you have too much money. This is all a bunch of hogwash I'm beginning to think that's total Washington DC inflation you childish little kids make me sick

comments_since_last_sample.body: It is increasingly becoming clear that the problem is anatomical in nature as there is definitely something other than testes where the ba$%^ used to be.
